headline: Smell natural gas? Get out fast! Piedmont Natural Gas reminds customers and communities how to identify a natural gas leak
summary: With more homes and businesses using natural gas for heat during the fall and winter months, Piedmont Natural Gas is encouraging customers and communities to learn the signs of a natural gas leak.
